newsitem.title: NETHERLANDS: Dutch finance ministry opens new DTC programme.
newsitem.headline: Dutch finance ministry opens new DTC programme.

text.p: The Dutch finance ministry on Tuesday opened a new Dutch Treasury Certificate (DTC) programme maturing on October 31 with a maximum issue amount of 7.5 billion guilders.
The programme is currently priced at 3.24 percent and DTCs will be issued on a continuous tap basis with a minimum transaction size of 5.0 million guilders.
Including the new DTCs, the ministry now has five short-term borrowing programmes in issue, maturing respectively on August 29, September 30, October 31, December 31 and June 30 1998.
